git_status.last_commit: 4cf9bd4 - Add checkpoint file for T042 (68 minutes ago)

work_context.current_task: Create standalone report generator with C4 diagrams and fix PlantUML identifier syntax
work_context.next_tasks: Test report generator with additional codebases; integrate with dashboard (T044-T049)
work_context.notes: Successfully created report_generator.py (921 lines) with all 4 C4 diagram levels. Fixed critical PlantUML syntax issue: hyphenated identifiers (spring-modulith) invalid in C4 macros - now sanitizing to underscores (spring_modulith). Generated comprehensive analysis for Spring Modulith: 11 modules, 176 classes, 894 methods, 460 dependencies. All diagrams render successfully on plantuml.com.

resume_instructions: Ensure you're in the project root: cd /workspace
Activate virtual environment if available: source .venv/bin/activate
Review modified files listed in this checkpoint
Review the work context for current tasks and blockers
Use GitHub Copilot with context from .github/copilot-instructions.md

project_goals: Demonstrate migration workflows from monoliths to microservices
Provide intelligent automation through agentic systems
Establish best practices for microservices decomposition
Enable practical implementation with real-world tools
copilot_context.current_phase: Initial phase focusing on development environment, Git workflow, tools structure, and reference codebase integration
